name: Members
description: A member is user that has an active account for Deepskydata.

activities.name: created
activities.description: When a new account gets created in Supabase.

activities.name: updated
activities.description: When account gets updated in Supabase

properties.name: member_id
properties.description: the unique id that is generated in Supabase to identify the user.

properties.name: member_attribution
properties.description: The answer a user gives during signup, where they heard about deepskydata

properties.name: member_job_title
properties.description: The answer a user gives during signup, what job title they have currently

properties.name: member_experience
properties.description: The answer a user gives during signup, what data experience they have

properties.name: member_created_at
properties.description: The date when an account has been created
